home.expertise.text: A holistic approach integrating market data, deep architectural analysis, and energetic sensitivity.
home.expertise.1.title: Local Knowledge
home.expertise.1.desc: Every CIELO journey begins with deep local knowledge. From Lisbon to Cascais and beyond, we understand each neighborhood’s character, rhythms, and long-term value — guiding our clients with insight shaped by experience, not trends.
home.expertise.2.title: Tailored
home.expertise.2.desc: No two clients are the same. Our approach is entirely bespoke — shaped around your lifestyle, priorities, and vision. From first conversation to final decision, every step is considered, personal, and precise.
home.expertise.3.title: Curation
home.expertise.3.desc: We don’t list everything — we curate. Each property is carefully selected for its quality, character, and sense of place, ensuring every home we present meets our standards of harmony, comfort, and enduring value.
home.expertise.4.title: Feng Shui
home.expertise.4.desc: A home is more than walls and structure — it is energy and flow. Our Feng Shui approach considers light, orientation, circulation, and balance, helping create spaces that support wellbeing, clarity, and ease of living.
home.expertise.5.title: Home Inspection
home.expertise.5.desc: Confidence comes from clarity. Our home inspection process looks beyond appearances, carefully assessing condition, structure, and potential — so every decision is informed, transparent, and secure.
home.partners.label: OUR PARTNERS

home.partners.subtitle: Our Ecosystem
home.partners.text: Our work is supported by a trusted ecosystem of real estate professionals, home inspection specialists, lawyers, mortgage providers, and Feng Shui consultants, ensuring depth, transparency, and peace of mind.

home.faq.title:
Everything you might
want to know.
home.faq.q1: What makes CIELO different from a traditional real estate agency?
home.faq.a1: CIELO operates as a real estate studio rather than a traditional brokerage. Our focus is on advisory, curation, and long-term relationships—placing equal importance on how a home feels as on its market value.
home.faq.a2: No. At CIELO, we go far beyond transactions. We support our clients with market analysis, property curation, relocation guidance, mortgage introductions, Feng Shui assessments, and independent home inspections—ensuring each decision is informed, aligned, and thoughtful.
home.faq.a3: Our studio is based in Lisbon, with a strong presence in Cascais. While these are our core markets, we have extensive experience selling and advising on homes across Portugal, from urban centers to coastal and countryside locations. We work under the real estate license AMI 12818.
home.faq.q4: How do I start working with CIELO?
home.faq.a4: It begins with a conversation. We take time to understand your goals, lifestyle, and priorities before presenting opportunities that truly fit. From there, we guide you through each step with clarity, discretion, and care.
home.faq.q5: Do you represent buyers, sellers, or both?
home.faq.a5: We work with both buyers and sellers. In all cases, our approach is guided by transparency, ethics, and clear alignment of expectations from the start.
home.faq.q6: Do you work with other real estate agents and professionals?
home.faq.a6: Yes. We collaborate with a selected network of brokers, home inspection specialists, Feng Shui consultants, legal advisors, and financial partners to ensure a comprehensive and transparent service.
home.faq.q7: Do you help with mortgage and financing solutions?
home.faq.a7: Yes. We collaborate with trusted mortgage lenders and financial institutions to introduce financing options suited to your profile, whether you are a resident or non-resident buyer.
home.faq.q8: How do you assess the Feng Shui of a home?
home.faq.a8: Our Feng Shui analysis considers orientation, natural light, circulation, layout, and the relationship between spaces. When needed, we collaborate with trusted Feng Shui consultants to evaluate energy flow and harmony, helping clients understand how a home supports wellbeing and balance.
home.faq.q9: Can you assist after the purchase is completed?
home.faq.a9: Yes. Our relationship doesn’t end at closing. We continue to support clients with post-purchase needs, including renovations, interior alignment, Feng Shui refinement, and trusted service providers.
home.faq.q10: Is your service suitable for investors as well as lifestyle buyers?
home.faq.a10: Yes. While many clients come to us for lifestyle-led purchases, we also advise investors seeking quality assets, long-term value, and strategic positioning in the Portuguese real estate market.
